name: qrd.js
description: Finds the shortest path between points in a matrix

scripts.preinstall: (which grunt > /dev/null || echo "[INFO] Install Grunt-CLI via 'sudo npm install -g grunt-cli' command"); (which mocha > /dev/null || echo "[INFO] Install Mocha via 'sudo npm install -g mocha' command");

author: Maciej Smolinski
